verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh when the saints
go marching in,
oh when the saints
go marching in,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
oh Lord I want to be
in that number,
oh when the Saints
go marching in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:

blow their horns,
oh when the angels
blow their horns.

verse.lines:

oh when the stars

verse.lines:

turns into blood,
oh when the moon,
turns into blood,

verse.lines:

shall become dark,
oh when the sun,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:

turns into fire,
oh when the earth,
turns into fire,

verse.lines:
Oh when the earth,
turns into fire,

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
